welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nederland, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our charming streets and immerse yourself in the rich culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jefferson County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Jefferson County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beaumont Municipal Airport serves domestic flights to and from various cities in the United States.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Beaumont Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, including imports and exports.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
